channel.title: Is it safe/possible to use Whonix in a non-graphical VM?
channel.description:
**Question**: Is it safe/possible to use Whonix in a non-graphical VM?
For instance, OpenBSD's [vmm](https://man.openbsd.org/vmm)/[vmd](https://man.openbsd.org/vmd)/[vmctl](https://man.openbsd.org/vmctl): https://www.openbsd.org/faq/faq16.html

item.title: Is it safe/possible to use Whonix in a non-graphical VM?
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Yes, all possible. CLI version exists. Start/stop with command line works. Serial console functional.

  • https://www.whonix.org/wiki/VirtualBox/CLI
  • https://www.whonix.org/wiki/KVM#Command_Line_Interface_.28CLI.29
  • https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Recovery#Serial_Console

Read full topic
